Master Answer:
In BC, individuals are considered as immune to measles with a birth date before January 1, 1970 (except for health care workers). Those who had measles in childhood are considered immune and the Measles, Mumps, Rubella (MMR) Vaccine is not recommended. Ask your mom to speak with her health care provider in Saskatchewan if she doesn't remember having measles in childhood.
Immunization Nurse
